languages.text: "Свидетельствую исполнение трех категорических требований для присвоения статуса мученика веры: противление врагу, сохранение приверженности догмату, принятие жестокой смерти. Запрашиваю право на изъятие органических тканей данного объекта с целью создания на их основе почетного сервочерепа".

"I attest that the three categorical requirements for assigning the status of martyr of the faith have been met: opposition to the enemy, preservation of adherence to dogma, and a brutal death. Requesting the right to extract the subject's organic matter for it to be used in the creation of an honourable servo-skull."
languages.original_text: "Свидетельствую исполнение трех категорических требований для присвоения статуса мученика веры: противление врагу, сохранение приверженности догмату, принятие жестокой смерти. Запрашиваю право на изъятие органических тканей данного объекта с целью создания на их основе почетного сервочерепа".

traits.locale_text: "Attesting to the fulfilment of the three categorical requirements for assigning the status of martyr of faith: opposing the enemy, preserving the adherence to the dogma, meeting a gruesome death. Requesting the right to extract the subject's organic matter for it to be used in the creation of an honourable servo-skull."

"Attesting to the fulfilment of the three categorical requirements for assigning the status of martyr of faith: opposing the enemy, preserving the adherence to the dogma, meeting a gruesome death. Requesting the right to extract the subject's organic matter for it to be used in the creation of an honourable servo-skull."

"I attest that the three categorical requirements for assigning the status of martyr of faith are fulfilled: opposing the enemy, preserving the adherence to the dogma, meeting a gruesome death. Requesting the right to extract the subject's organic matter for it to be used in the creation of an honourable servo-skull."

"I attest that the three categorical requirements for assigning the status of martyr of faith are fulfilled: opposing the enemy, preserving the adherence to the dogma, meeting a gruesome death. Requesting the right to extract the subject's organic matter for it to be used in the creation of an honourable servo-skull."

"I attest that the three categorical requirements for assigning the status of martyr of the faith have been met: opposition to the enemy, preservation of adherence to dogma, and a brutal death. Requesting the right to extract the subject's organic matter for it to be used in the creation of an honourable servo-skull."

"I attest that the three categorical requirements for assigning the status of martyr of the faith have been met: opposition to the enemy, preservation of adherence to dogma, and a brutal death. Requesting the right to extract the subject's organic matter for it to be used in the creation of an honourable servo-skull."

languages.text: “我再次证明，赋予烈士地位的三个绝对要求已经得到了满足：反抗敌人、坚守教条，以及残酷的死亡。请求授权提取目标的有机物，用来制造象征荣耀的伺服头骨。”
languages.original_text: "I attest that the three categorical requirements for assigning the status of martyr of the faith have been met: opposition to the enemy, preservation of adherence to dogma, and a brutal death. Requesting the right to extract the subject's organic matter for it to be used in the creation of an honourable servo-skull."

traits.locale_text: “我再次证明，赋予烈士地位的三个绝对要求已经得到了满足：反抗敌人、坚守教条，以及残酷的死亡。请求授权提取目标的有机物，用来制造象征荣耀的伺服头骨。”

languages.text: «Confirmo que se han cumplido con tres requisitos categóricos para otorgar el título de mártir de la fe: oposición al enemigo, preservación de la adhesión al dogma y ser víctima de una muerte brutal. Solicito el derecho a extraer la materia orgánica del sujeto para emplearla en la creación de un honorable servocráneo».
languages.original_text: "I attest that the three categorical requirements for assigning the status of martyr of the faith have been met: opposition to the enemy, preservation of adherence to dogma, and a brutal death. Requesting the right to extract the subject's organic matter for it to be used in the creation of an honourable servo-skull."

traits.locale_text: «Confirmo que se han cumplido con tres requisitos categóricos para otorgar el título de mártir de la fe: oposición al enemigo, preservación de la adhesión al dogma y ser víctima de una muerte brutal. Solicito el derecho a extraer la materia orgánica del sujeto para emplearla en la creación de un honorable servocráneo».

languages.text: 「殉教者たる絶対条件、敵への抵抗、教義の遵守、残忍な死、この3つをクリアしていました。ここに証明する。名誉あるサーヴォスカルを作る際に使用するため、被験者の有機物を取り出す権利を要求したい」
languages.original_text: "I attest that the three categorical requirements for assigning the status of martyr of the faith have been met: opposition to the enemy, preservation of adherence to dogma, and a brutal death. Requesting the right to extract the subject's organic matter for it to be used in the creation of an honourable servo-skull."

traits.locale_text: 「殉教者たる絶対条件、敵への抵抗、教義の遵守、残忍な死、この3つをクリアしていました。ここに証明する。名誉あるサーヴォスカルを作る際に使用するため、被験者の有機物を取り出す権利を要求したい」

languages.text: "Ich attestiere, dass die drei kategorischen Voraussetzungen für den Status eines Märtyrers des Glaubens erfüllt sind: Auflehnung gegen den Feind, Beharren auf dem Einhalten der Dogmen und ein brutaler Tod. Ich bitte um das Recht, die organische Materie des Subjekts zu entnehmen, auf dass sie für die Erstellung eines Servoschädels zu seinen Ehren benutzt werde."
languages.original_text: "I attest that the three categorical requirements for assigning the status of martyr of the faith have been met: opposition to the enemy, preservation of adherence to dogma, and a brutal death. Requesting the right to extract the subject's organic matter for it to be used in the creation of an honourable servo-skull."

traits.locale_text: "Ich attestiere, dass die drei kategorischen Voraussetzungen für den Status eines Märtyrers des Glaubens erfüllt sind: Auflehnung gegen den Feind, Beharren auf dem Einhalten der Dogmen und ein brutaler Tod. Ich bitte um das Recht, die organische Materie des Subjekts zu entnehmen, auf dass sie für die Erstellung eines Servoschädels zu seinen Ehren benutzt werde."

languages.text: « J'atteste que les trois conditions impératives requises pour accorder le statut de martyr de la foi ont été remplies : opposition à l'ennemi, préservation de la fidélité au dogme et mort brutale. Je demande le droit d'extraire la matière organique du sujet afin qu'elle puisse être utilisée dans la création d'un servocrâne honorable. »
languages.original_text: "I attest that the three categorical requirements for assigning the status of martyr of the faith have been met: opposition to the enemy, preservation of adherence to dogma, and a brutal death. Requesting the right to extract the subject's organic matter for it to be used in the creation of an honourable servo-skull."

traits.locale_text: « J'atteste que les trois conditions impératives requises pour accorder le statut de martyr de la foi ont été remplies : opposition à l'ennemi, préservation de la fidélité au dogme et mort brutale. Je demande le droit d'extraire la matière organique du sujet afin qu'elle puisse être utilisée dans la création d'un servocrâne honorable. »

languages.text: "Şehitlik mertebesinin verilmesi için üç kategorik şartın yerine getirildiğini onaylıyorum. Bunlar; düşmana muhalefet, dogmaya bağlılığın korunması ve vahşi bir ölüm. Onurlu bir hizmelet oluşturmada kullanılmak üzere öznenin organik maddesini çıkarma izni talep ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "I attest that the three categorical requirements for assigning the status of martyr of the faith have been met: opposition to the enemy, preservation of adherence to dogma, and a brutal death. Requesting the right to extract the subject's organic matter for it to be used in the creation of an honourable servo-skull."

traits.locale_text: "Şehitlik statüsünü atamak için üç kategorik şartın yerine getirildiğini onaylıyorum: düşmana muhalefet, dogmaya bağlılığın korunması ve vahşi bir ölüm. Onurlu bir hizmelet oluşturmada kullanılmak üzere öznenin organik maddesini çıkarma izni talep ediyorum."
